metadata.title: CVE-2022-3486 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An open redirect vulnerability in GitLab EE/CE affecting all versions from9.3 prior to 15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to 15.5.2, allowsan attacker to redirect users to an arbitrary location if they trust theURL.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
